title: My personal shop, had other skins?
body: Hey, my old shop had the new Orianna skin at a cheap price, can I still get that?

replies.body: I don't really have picture proof, but I read a comment saying the system remembers the shop, from before the new one was made? ^^'

Yes, we have access to your original set if you received one at that time!  I do want to make something clear, though, players who didn't have their client launched during the first set won't have any because nothing loaded for them.

> [{quoted}](name=Dashbie,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=0LZyVMWZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-20T08:33:22.803+0000)
>
> I don't really have picture proof, but I read a comment saying the system remembers the shop, from before the new one was made? ^^'

just contact support and ask them for it and they should help you , if I understood correctly
I got almost the same skins as before the shop got deleted BUT they had ALL a higher discount then now.  I feel slightly pranked :^)
Ouch lol!  Yeah, definitely reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll see about giving you the better discount you initially received!

If you had a first set of items you wanted before the reset, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We can look into honoring the initial set, without impacting your new ones.  See you there!
